title: This War of Mine: Final Cut – v6.0.7 + All DLCs + OST
body:
This War of Mine: Final Cut – v6.0.7 + All DLCs + OST


Genres/Tags: Lifestyle, Strategy, Survival, Side, 3D
Company: 11 bit Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI12
Original Size: 3.1 GB
Repack Size: 1.7 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on This.War.of.Mine.Final.Cut-CODEX ISO release: codex-this.war.of.mine.final.cut.iso (3,335,880,704 bytes)
  • All DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Bonus FLAC/WAV soundtrack files ripped (MP3 left intact). NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.1 to 1.7 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 3 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • You can change the language in game settings

Game Description

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition

It’s been two years since This War of Mine global release and we’re still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly – a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about?

Game Features

  • Inspired by real-life events
  • Control your survivors and manage your shelter
  • Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive
  • Make decisions – an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience
  • Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game
  • Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game’s theme

Included DLCs

  • This War of Mine – War Child Charity DLC
  • This War of Mine – The Little Ones DLC
  • This War of Mine – Soundtrack
  • This War of Mine: Stories – Episode 1 – Father’s Promise
  • This War of Mine: Stories – Episode 2 – The Last Broadcast
  • This War of Mine: Stories – Episode 3 – Fading Embers

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous TWoM repacks.
